name: Bubble Splash
statusOutcome: [AttackerName] levanta una de sus manos con una sonrisa antes de señalar [TargetName], e innumerables burbujas flotantes se elevan hacia [TargetHimOrHer], explotando rápidamente en un desastre pegajoso y restringido, que se conecta con la piscina de burbujas de burbujas!
statusMiss: [AttackerName] lifts one of her hands with a smile before pointing at [TargetName], and countless floating bubbles surges towards [TargetHimOrHer], but [TargetHeOrShe] manages to avoid the soon to explode gooey bubbles!
restraintStruggleCharmed: [TargetName] squirms against [AttackerName]'s sticky and slick slime, barely resisting the urge to settle into their embrace...
restraintEscaped: |f|GetEventAndSetProgress|/|BubbleSlimeCombatEvent|/|0|n|[TargetName] manages to break free of the sticky slime and makes some distance from the bubbling pool!
restraintEscapedFail: But [TargetName] remains bound by the sticky ooze!
